list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Ensure mandatory environment variables for FiveM server
Updated the entrypoint script to enforce that critical environment variables (FIVEM_LICENSE, STEAM_WEBAPIKEY, ONESYNC_STATE) are set before starting the server. This improves reliability by preventing server startup with undefined or incorrect configuration.

task.summary: Default task

Add IntelliJ IDEA project files to version control
Include essential project configuration files for IntelliJ IDEA, such as module, VCS, and project settings. Added `.gitignore` to exclude user-specific and environment-dependent files.

Add Docker deployment setup and clean up project files
Removed redundant IntelliJ IDEA project files and updated `.gitignore` for better compatibility. Added Dockerfiles, deployment scripts, and container configurations for VPS and GTAV game server environments. Included setup for Docker build, push, and cleanup scripts for streamlined deployment.

Refactor deployment and container setup for consistency
Unified Dockerfile structure across base, VPS, and FiveM images. Refactored scripts to streamline build, push, and cleanup processes. Added improved environment configuration, user management, and default setup scripts for consistent deployment in Pterodactyl-compatible containers.

Remove deprecated VPS scripts and Dockerfiles, refactor FiveM setup.
Deleted obsolete files related to VPS containers and simplified the project by focusing solely on FiveM deployment. Updated Dockerfiles and install scripts for FiveM to align with a standardized, minimal structure, improving maintainability and compatibility with the Pterodactyl platform. Streamlined the deployment script to reflect these changes.

Refactor FiveM setup and remove deprecated VPS scripts.
Simplified project by focusing solely on FiveM deployment. Updated Dockerfiles, install scripts, and entrypoint for improved maintainability and compatibility with Pterodactyl. Removed outdated VPS-related files and standardized configuration for streamlined deployment.

Refactor FiveM setup and improve installation scripts.
Streamlined FiveM installation by refining scripts to include safer curl options, removing redundant directory creation, and improving txAdmin integration. Updated configuration descriptions for clarity and adjusted Docker-related scripts for better maintainability and compatibility with Pterodactyl. Removed deprecated references to outdated VPS scripts.

Refactor FiveM setup and enhance installation scripts.
Improved FiveM installation by refining scripts with safer curl usage and eliminating redundant operations. Enhanced txAdmin integration by adding external IP detection and better logging for accessibility. Updated associated configurations for clarity and improved compatibility with Pterodactyl.

Add server.cfg and update FiveM setup for better integration
Bundled a default server.cfg within the Docker image, removing the need to download it during runtime. Updated installation scripts and Dockerfile to handle server.cfg appropriately, enhancing maintainability. Improved overall clarity and alignment with Pterodactyl panel compatibility best practices.

Refactor FiveM setup and improve integration.
Bundled server.cfg within the Docker image, eliminating runtime downloads and improving maintainability. Updated installation and entrypoint scripts to include better error handling, directory setup, and FXServer validation. Enhanced Dockerfile with health checks and improved compatibility with Pterodactyl.

Refactor FiveM setup and enhance integration.
Bundled `server.cfg` directly into the Docker image to eliminate runtime downloads and improve maintainability. Updated installation script for better error handling, FXServer validation, and directory structure. Improved Dockerfile health checks and ensured compatibility with the Pterodactyl panel.

Refactor FiveM setup and enhance installation process.
Improved installation script with retries, better error handling, and enhanced directory setup. Bundled `server.cfg` directly into the Docker image to eliminate runtime downloads and increase maintainability. Updated integration to ensure compatibility with the Pterodactyl panel and added robust FXServer validation.

Make FXServer executable and refine FiveM installation.
Updated the installation script to ensure FXServer is executable, enhancing usability. Simplified the startup command for clarity and streamlined the FiveM setup process for better integration and maintainability. These changes improve compatibility with the Pterodactyl panel while bolstering error handling and directory setup.

Refactor FiveM setup and improve deployment scripts.
Removed unused NO_CACHE variable and adjusted deploy.sh menu for clarity. Updated Dockerfile to streamline file copying, simplify paths, and ensure FXServer executability. Enhanced maintainability, error handling, and compatibility with the Pterodactyl panel.

Refactor FiveM setup and deployment scripts
Streamlined deployment script by removing unused variables, improving menu options, and simplifying exit behavior. Updated installation and Dockerfile scripts for better error handling, clarity, and FXServer executable setup. These changes enhance maintainability, usability, and compatibility with external systems like Pterodactyl.

Refactor FiveM Dockerfile and add .dockerignore
Streamlined the Dockerfile by enhancing file management, integrating the Darkmatter repo, and improving cleanup processes. Added a .dockerignore file to exclude unnecessary files and directories, optimizing the build context. These changes improve clarity, maintainability, and build performance.

Refactor FiveM Dockerfile and improve error handling
Enhanced the Dockerfile by improving file management, verifying required files, and integrating error handling during the build process. Updated file paths and commands for consistency and clarity. These changes improve maintainability, build reliability, and deployment efficiency.

Refactor FiveM Dockerfile and improve error handling
Streamlined file management by downloading only necessary files from the repository. Enhanced error handling during the build process and updated commands for better clarity and consistency. These changes improve maintainability, build reliability, and deployment efficiency.

Refactor FiveM installation and deployment scripts.
Streamlined installation by adding dependency checks, improving error handling, and enhancing folder structure setup. Updated deployment scripts to fetch missing files dynamically and clarified download/extraction processes. These changes improve reliability, maintainability, and ease of installation.

Refactor FiveM installation and deployment scripts.
Streamlined installation process with improved error handling and dependency checks. Updated scripts to dynamically fetch missing files and clarified download/extraction processes. These changes enhance reliability, maintainability, and ease of setup.

Refactor FiveM installation and deployment scripts.
Improved error handling, added dependency checks, and ensured all required files are dynamically fetched. Enhanced folder setup and clarified script processes to improve reliability, maintainability, and ease of installation. Updated container image for better compatibility.

Refactor FiveM installation and deployment scripts.
Improved error handling, added dependency checks, and ensured all required files are dynamically fetched. Enhanced folder setup and clarified script processes to improve reliability, maintainability, and ease of installation. Updated container image for better compatibility.

Refactor FiveM setup and deployment scripts
Updated Dockerfile, install, and entrypoint scripts for improved modularity, error handling, and dynamic artifact fetching. Enhanced folder structure setup, added version checks, clarified configuration options, and ensured compatibility with ESX Legacy and txAdmin. These updates streamline installation and improve reliability and maintainability.

Refactor FiveM startup and deployment scripts
Simplified and optimized the FiveM entrypoint script for better modularity and readability. Replaced array-based startup commands with a more streamlined string-based approach and improved dynamic parameter handling. Added runtime health checks for essential files and directories, ensuring a more robust and reliable setup.

Fix FiveM artifact URL in install script.
Updated the artifact URLs in `install.sh` to replace `build_proot_linux` with `build_linux`, ensuring the correct links are used for fetching builds. This change improves compatibility and prevents potential download errors during installation.

Fix FiveM artifact URL in install script.
Updated the artifact URLs in `install.sh` to replace `build_proot_linux` with `build_linux`, ensuring the correct links are used for fetching builds. This change improves compatibility and prevents potential download errors during installation.

Ensure mandatory environment variables for FiveM server
Updated the entrypoint script to enforce that critical environment variables (FIVEM_LICENSE, STEAM_WEBAPIKEY, ONESYNC_STATE) are set before starting the server. This improves reliability by preventing server startup with undefined or incorrect configuration.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Ensure mandatory environment variables for FiveM server
Updated the entrypoint script to enforce that critical environment variables (FIVEM_LICENSE, STEAM_WEBAPIKEY, ONESYNC_STATE) are set before starting the server. This improves reliability by preventing server startup with undefined or incorrect configuration.
